author: A_Brickset_user
title: At least it has TWO bricks...
review: This is pretty much the other Nick Bluetooth figure with some stupid wings. My thoughts on this set are the same as those on all other Galidor sets - it's not proper LEGO. However, this one does contain two bullets which can be used in a normal LEGO blaster, so it earns one point.

author: hustla187
title: At Least it has Lego Pieces
review: The missiles in this set are Lego pieces which is a nice feature because this is the only Galidor set with actual Lego pieces. However, Nick with wings isn't that good, so it only gets a 2. At least Lego tried to put Lego pieces in this set.
